https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yA6yhwz3mZmgLYEKHRhXyKeOZKF.jpg In this documentary directed by Spike Lee, he interviews the cast and crew of his 1989 film DO THE RIGHT THING. It also includes footage from a twentieth-anniversary screening of the film. Do the Right Thing: 20 Years Later
